title: New: Katéa – That Ain't Love
body:
Listing Tove Lo, Adele and Lana Del Rey amongst her influences, it’s clear that Helsinki newcomer **Katéa** is setting the bar high, and her debut single, _That Ain’t Love_, certainly strives to reach those lofty heights.

A booming, Florence & The Machine-esque number, her vocal takes centre stage, building the track around a chorus of colossal proportions. Check it out below.
